    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1742</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Purim activities</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Purim Aktivitäten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités de Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades de Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività di Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες Purim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades de Purim</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">worsheet activities for Purim for younger Children, soring the chart, drawing a line to complete the sentences etc</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Purim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">worksheet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">worsheet Aktivitäten für Purim für jüngere 
Kinder, soring das Diagramm, eine Zeile zeichnend, um die 
Programmsätze usw. durchzuführen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activités de worsheet pour Purim pour les 
enfants plus en bas âge, douloureux le diagramme, traçant une ligne 
pour terminer les phrases etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividades do worsheet para Purim para crianças 
mais novas, soring a carta, desenhando uma linha para terminar as 
sentenças etc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività del worsheet per Purim per i bambini 
più in giovane età, soring la tabella, dissipante una riga per 
completare le frasi ecc</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">worsheet δραστηριότητες για Purim για τα πιό 
μικρά παιδιά, poy το διάγραμμα, που σύρει μια γραμμή για να 
ολοκληρώσει τις προτάσεις κ.λπ...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actividades del worsheet para Purim para niños 
más jóvenes, dolorido la carta, trazando una línea para terminar 
las sentencias etc</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Purim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
